name: Tyrone HIGHTOWER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Hightower v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Tyrone HIGHTOWER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 2014, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Chad L. Allensworth, PA Board of Probation & Parole, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
100 A.3d 584
Tyrone HIGHTOWER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 2014.
Tyrone T. Hightower, Pro Se.
Chad L. Allensworth, PA Board of Probation & Parole, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
